dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines. Map of Dhaka, Bangladesh, showing roads, streets, important buildings, railway lines and stations. "Printed at the Survey of Pākistān offices Comilla." "This map has been traced from air photos taken in 1952 of the area and may contain small variation in scale." "Reg. No. 357 C. D'52 (E.P. 6.3.2'')-500. 55" Includes indexes to roads and principal buildings.
dct_publisher_sm: Comilla, [Bangladesh] : published under the Surveyor General of Pakistan, 1952.
